# List of wars involving Yugoslavia

This is a list of wars involving Yugoslavia.

*Maribor, Meža Valley and Jezersko are ceded to Kingdom of Serbs, Croats and Slovenes.

|- bgcolor="#FFCCCB"
|Croatian War of Independence(1991–1995)
| SFR Yugoslavia Serb-controlled units of the JNA participated in combat operations throughout 1991 and up to May 1992 in support of the Republic of Serbian Krajina.}}
* SAO Krajina
* SAO Eastern Slavonia, Baranja and Western Syrmia
* SAO Western Slavonia}}
----
Serbian Krajina
* Republika Srpska}}}}
| Croatia}}
----
Croatia}}
|Erdut Agreement
* Yugoslav army formally withdrew from Croatia from January 1992 under the Sarajevo Agreement
* Croatian forces regained control over most of Republic of Serbian Krajina-held territory
*Eastern Slavonia remained under Serbian control until 1996 when it came under effective UN control
* Croatian forces advanced into Bosnia and Herzegovina to assist the united Bosnian and Croatian side, which led to the eventual end of the Bosnian War in December 1995
*The Croatian government gains control over the vast majority of territory previously held by rebel Serbs, with the remainder coming under UNTAES control.
|- bgcolor="#99ff99"
|Yugoslav campaign in Bosnia(1992)
|}} Republika Srpska
|
|Victory
*TOBiH and HV eliminated from Foča, Višegrad, Kupres, Ilidža, Prijedor, Šamac, Zvornik, Čajniče, Doboj, Brčko, Bratunac, and more
*Establishment of the VRS
*The JNA and HV leave Bosnia due to agreements with the UN
*Republika Srpska formed as a self-proclaimed Serb state from Bosnia
*Republika Srpska increases its land control from 40% to 52%
|}
